trans-unit.source: Defines properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 定義屬性和事件，以允許像在網頁上的按鈕控制項必須實作。

trans-unit.source: The IButtonControl interface defines the properties and events that must be implemented to allow a control to act like a button on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: IButtonControl 介面定義的屬性和事件必須實作以允許控制像是在網頁上的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The members of this interface provide basic button functionality, such as the ability to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click> event and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 此介面的成員提供基本按鈕功能，例如能夠引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click>事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Click>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property provides cross-page posting functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A>屬性提供跨網頁公佈功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否按一下按鈕會發生頁面驗證。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the CausesValidation property to indicate whether clicking the button causes page validation to occur.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作 CausesValidation 屬性表示是否按一下按鈕會發生頁面驗證。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if clicking the button causes page validation to occur; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果按一下按鈕會導致發生; 頁面驗證否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在按下按鈕控制項時，會引發 Click 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按下按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Command event is raised when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 命令事件時按下按鈕控制項時引發。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional argument that is propagated to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選用的引數，會傳播到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the CommandArgument property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作 CommandArgument 屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>屬性來表示引數和命令名稱會傳播至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: The argument that is propagated to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引數，會傳播到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name that is propagated to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定傳播至其中的命令名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A> property and the CommandName property to indicate the argument and command name that are propagated to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A>屬性和 CommandName 屬性表示的引數和命令名稱，會傳播至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: The name of the command that is propagated to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 傳播至命令的名稱<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.Command"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當按一下按鈕控制項目前的頁面從傳送至 Web 網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can use the PostBackUrl property to perform a cross-page post.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 PostBackUrl 屬性執行跨網頁回傳。

trans-unit.source: If the PostBackUrl property is set to the page that the button is currently on, a normal postback event cycle occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PostBackUrl 屬性設定為 [] 按鈕上目前的頁面，就會發生一般的回傳事件循環。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the PostBackUrl property to indicate the URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作 PostBackUrl 屬性，表示當按下按鈕控制項目前的頁面從傳送至 Web 網頁的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the button control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下按鈕控制項目前的頁面從傳送至 Web 網頁的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕顯示的文字標題。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the Text property to indicate the text caption displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作以表示按鈕顯示的文字標題的文字屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed for the button.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的文字標題按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的控制項的按鈕控制項時，會造成驗證回傳至伺服器群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface must implement the ValidationGroup property to indicate the name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 實作控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>介面必須實作 ValidationGroup 屬性，指出控制項的按鈕控制項時，會造成驗證回傳至伺服器群組的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: The name for the group of controls for which the button control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的按鈕控制項時，會造成驗證回傳至伺服器群組的名稱。
